alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:41PM CDT until August 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT/815 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS...NORTHERN LOGAN AND SOUTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 641 PM MDT/741 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Brewster, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brewster, Levant and Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 23 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
